name: Women's Exoplanets Hunter T-shirt
description:
Upon transfer of Project Discovery to CONCORD, a new program of exoplanets hunting was embarked on by the citizen science platform. The Exoplanets Hunter T-shirt is often seen being worn both off-duty and at work by members of the Project Discovery Exoplanets Program.

Incorporating the Project Discovery Exoplanets Program logo and colors, this T-shirt shows that the wearer is a contributor to the search for planets outside the bounds of human-explored space.
